mapper.select: SELECT jpb.job_posting_board_id, jpb.job_posting_board_title, jpb.job_posting_board_content, cd.company_id, cd.company_detail_id, cd.company_picture, cd.company_address, cd.company_phonenumber, cd.company_email FROM job_posting_board jpb INNER JOIN company_detail cd ON jpb.company_id = cd.company_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_posting_board( job_posting_board_title, job_posting_board_content, created_at) VALUE(#{jobPostingBoardTitle},#{jobPostingBoardContent},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT jpb.job_posting_board_id, jpb.job_posting_board_title, jpb.job_posting_board_content, cd.company_id, cd.company_detail_id, cd.company_picture, cd.company_address, cd.company_phonenumber, cd.company_email FROM job_posting_board jpb INNER JOIN company_detail cd ON jpb.company_id = cd.company_id WHERE job_posting_board_id = #{jobPostingBoardId};
